text: Acquarossa is the capital of the district of Blenio in the canton of Ticino in Switzerland. Acquarossa was created on 4 April 2004, when the former municipalities of Castro, Corzoneso, Dongio, Largario, Leontica, Lottigna, Marolta, Ponto Valentino and Prugiasco merged to form the new municipality of Acquarossa. == References == == Other websites == * * Official website Category:2000s establishments in Switzerland Category:2004 establishments in Europe Category:Municipalities in Blenio
title: Acquarossa
